property.name: videoTranscript
property.value:
“Hi, I’m Marc, Marc Hill. I’m the associate director for culture education and training at the Defense Language and National Security Education Office, better known as DLNSEO. Welcome to this VCAT Course.

“The Virtual Culture Awareness Trainers were designed and developed to provide culture and language training to individuals studying, working, and serving abroad. We work with many different partners to ensure that our learners are properly prepared for the exciting challenges that they may face.

“As a former service member, I know firsthand how learning a language and being able to work across cultures can help achieve mission success. We are proud to offer you this course as part of a wide range of language, culture, and regional training products. I’m confident that you will enjoy this course and will find it very beneficial in your service abroad.”
